entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Gjoa Haven
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 09:12 AM MST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Blowing Snow, -18.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Gjoa Haven Airport 12:00 PM MST Friday 20 January 2023
Condition: Blowing Snow
Temperature: -18.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.5 kPa falling
Visibility: 0.4 km
Humidity: 84 %
Wind Chill: -33
Dewpoint: -20.1°C
Wind: ENE 49 km/h gust 63 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Blizzard. Temperature steady near minus 19.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Wind east 50 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature steady near minus 19. Wind chill near minus 36. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 09:00 AM MST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Blizzard. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Wind northeast 50 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 36 this evening and minus 45 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 09:00 AM MST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Blizzard. Temperature falling to minus 33 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Blizzard ending in the morning then clearing. Wind northeast 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming north 30 in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 33 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 43 in the morning and minus 49 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 09:00 AM MST Friday 20 January 2023
